investigation_process: Complaint received, preliminary review, entity notification, information gathering, investigation, determination
Breach report received, scope determination, entity interview, documentation request, findings determination
authority: OCR with law enforcement coordination as needed

investigation_process: Proactive compliance review, entity examination, system access review, interviews, findings report
authority: OCR conducted on-site or desk review

investigation_process: Investigation triggered by BA complaints, access to PHI, subcontractor oversight issues
authority: OCR with potential covered entity involvement

investigation_process: Investigation of intentional knowing or reckless HIPAA violations, enhanced scrutiny, potential criminal referral
authority: OCR with DOJ coordination for criminal violations

investigation_process: Multi-year investigation into systematic HIPAA violations, multiple incidents or entities, comprehensive review
authority: OCR and potentially state attorneys general

investigation_process: Follow-up investigation to verify entity compliance with settlement agreement and corrective actions
Investigation conducted jointly with state attorney general or other government agencies
authority: OCR with state and federal coordination

investigation_process: Expedited investigation of serious breaches or ongoing violations, faster timeline and intensive review
Referral to Department of Justice for investigation of criminal HIPAA violations including fraud and willful injury
